docs.snippet: Officers responding to the home of an 86-year-old New York City man who called 911 to say he'd shot his daughter fatally shot the man Saturday after he turned toward them with a shotgun and refused to drop it when they arrived, police said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Officers responding to the home of an 86-year-old New York City man who called 911 to say he'd shot his daughter fatally shot the man Saturday after he turned toward them with a shotgun and refused to drop it when they arrived, police said.

headline.main: Police: NY Officer Fatally Shot 86-Year-Old Gunman
headline.print_headline: Police: NY Officer Fatally Shot 86-Year-Old Gunman

docs.snippet: Students at the University of Kentucky bred a colt that has a chance to qualify Saturday for the Kentucky Derby....
docs.lead_paragraph: Students at the University of Kentucky bred a colt that has a chance to qualify Saturday for the Kentucky Derby.
docs.abstract: Casiguapo, horse bred by the University of Kentucky to help students in its equine science and management program, has become successful racehorse and now has chance to qualify for the Kentucky Derby.

headline.main: Kentucky Students Catch Breath to Cheer a Derby Hopeful
headline.print_headline: After Final Four, Kentucky Students Catch Their Breath to Cheer for a Derby Hopeful

docs.snippet: State pushback against a movement to unionize college athletes has begun in Ohio, the football-loving heart of a heated anti-labor campaign in 2011 and home to one of America's highest-grossing collegiate franchises, the Ohio State Buckeyes....
